start.text: I'll show you what a proud cog can do.
We are but cogs with wings! Our powers will crush the enemy!
The captain's plans are infallible, as such we will never know defeat!

start_boss.text: This is not a suicide mission! Shoot them all down and let's go home!

out_of_missiles.text: We've launched a boatful of ordnance, and still they won't even flinch!

engaged.text: I'll swat you right out of the void!
Go! Rip the wings off those degenerates!
I'll turn their craft into a wreath.

pursuing.text: I'll go head on and take him down with me!
I'll prove myself by taking him down.

running.text: I'll get his attention, you finish him off!

hull_90.text: Victory is achieved through perseverance and persevere we will!
I hereby swear that I will be a proud, brave and vigilant soldier.

hull_50.text: Our salvation is not yet at hand!
The only lives you'll take are from us!
To uphold the honor of our nation and its military.

hull_30.text: To submit to the orders of my superiors.
If I go down it's up to you!

overload.text: We're dead men walking, why should we fear death?
Get this done, you hear me?
This guy's nuts, but he sure is good.

victory.text: We are here not to allow our allies to retreat, but to advance!
